response.overview: Shivanna has been living a happy life in his hometown for the past 60 years.  He is the senior citizen of his said society / community and he does last ritual work for his community , he is agriculturist by nature and he cultivates his agricultural land for his and his wife's daily basic needs, he happily leads his life along with the soil and nature.  Shivanna has a son named Puneet.  He is working in an IT company in Bangalore.  Puneet wanted his parents to be staying with him in Bengaluru city and take care of them.  On the insistence of the son, Shivanna and his wife come to Bengaluru city for the first time in their life.  The happiness of the mind is never fulfilled by money, it is only with nature / place where we lived.  One such incident / event that take place between the father and son at that point the entire story/film will bring you to last stage.
